H0.text: Judge Jeffreys presided over the trials of 1685 following which rebellion. Rye House Plot

H1.text: Judge Jeffreys presided over the trials of 1685 following which rebellion. Argyll's Rising

H2.text: Judge Jeffreys presided over the trials of 1685 following which rebellion. English Civil War

H3.text: Judge Jeffreys presided over the trials of 1685 following which rebellion. MONMOUTH

A4.text: The subsequent Bloody Assizes of Judge Jeffreys were a series of trials of Monmouth's supporters

A5.text: The Monmouth Rebellion (Also known as the Pitchfork Rebellion, Revolt of the West or West Country rebellion) in June 1685 was an attempt to depose James II
